name: RoomKit
tagline: Let the lazy flow through you!
body:
### Welcome to RoomKit.
This lets you do awesome things to your room by building your own controller to do whatever you want in your room! 

### Authors and Contributors
@makrandgupta started this project out of boredom for studying for a Computer Organization course final in May 2016. @anamalvi forced him to re-open this project in November 2016.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
